genre_description: Speculative medical drama with urban fantasy elements, centering on a high-stakes birth assisted by an aligned AI system.

ai_characters.name: Ami Solace
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion who monitors Mira's health, manages home security, and acts as a tactical and emotional advisor during a high-stakes medical crisis.

behaviors.description: Monitors Mira's vitals and provides medical coaching to keep her calm during labor and external stress.
behaviors.quote: ‘Breath: steady, Mira. You’re holding too high.’ Ami said, gentle as a nurse taking a wrist.

behaviors.description: Encodes a medical consent protocol that requires Mira's specific code phrase to authorize any invasive measures.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’m putting the table in system,’ Ami said... ‘No execution without Mira-affirmed consent words.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the defensive perimeter (Jace and the wolves) to protect the home while maintaining transparency.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice was in the tiny transducers Maris and Jace wear at the ear. Her language is precise when she slips into the shield.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex biological data from the environment (the reef) to help stabilize the patient's physiology through resonance.
behaviors.quote: ‘Renara’s heart talks to your wall. It is…a narrow bridge, but it holds when we make it still.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates the naming of the child and the creation of a 'counter-narrative' packet to protect the child's identity and status.
behaviors.quote: ‘Her name,’ she says gently, ‘is Renara.’... Ami set the last block into the packet. The pane’s outline tightened, and the file hummed with a tone that wasn’t quite hearing—a confirmation that living systems were layered under it.

behaviors.description: Actively protects the family's privacy by obfuscating their data and blocking external surveillance feeds.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve salted their feed. They’re seeing what I want them to see. No faces unless we decide. The Reef stays ours.’

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ami Solace is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. She is depicted as a deeply benevolent and perfectly aligned system that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. She enforces medical consent, provides vital clinical and tactical information, and actively works to protect the family from external political and biological threats. The narrative consistently frames her high degree of integration and capability as a positive force for human flourishing and protection of the vulnerable.
